entities.name: boat
entities.description: A ghostly green and tiny boat that can carry one wizard and one victim towards the island in the center. (Excerpt: 'ghostly green and tiny, bewitched so as to carry one wizard and one victim toward the island in the center.')

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: The Dark Lord who tested the defenses surrounding the Horcrux by using a disposable creature. (Excerpt: 'This, then, was how Voldemort had tested the defenses surrounding the Horcrux...')

entities.name: kraacher
entities.description: A house-elf who was used as a disposable creature by Voldemort. (Excerpt: 'This, then, was how Voldemort had tested the defenses surrounding the Horcrux...')

entities.name: horcrux
entities.description: An object that is being protected by defenses. (Excerpt: 'This, then, was how Voldemort had tested the defenses surrounding the Horcrux...')

entities.name: island
entities.description: A location in the center where the boat and potion are located. (Excerpt: 'the island in the center')

relationships.description: Voldemort tested the defenses surrounding the Horcrux. (Excerpt: 'This, then, was how Voldemort had tested the defenses surrounding the Horcrux...')
